content.c_answer2: Mrs. Doubtfire \- The Musical is based on the book by Karey Kirkpatrick and John O'Farrell and is directed by Jerry Zake, with music and lyrics by Wayne Kirkpatrick and Karey Kirkpatrick.
content.name: Who wrote Mrs. Doubtfire - The Musical?
content.question: Who wrote Mrs. Doubtfire - The Musical?
